about_the_game:
This is a DLC of game "The Most Lecherous". You need standard edition to play with this.

With this DLC, you'll unlock 32 new characters of Anime Pack in the game. They're all characters of Japanese Anime art style.

When you're looking for a game full of surprises and excitement, look no further! We proudly present our latest masterpiece: The Most Lecherous!

It's free, it's free, it's free! With no cost, you can't be cheated, you can't be fooled, and you can draw cards to your heart's content!

With each flash of holy light when you draw an SSR, you will experience the exciting fun and thrill that will keep you coming back for more!


Whether it's cute anime characters (which requires extra payment) or seductive adult women, our game has everything you could ask for!


With just a simple tap, you can experience the most thrilling gaming experience. When you draw your dream card, your excitement will reach an unprecedented climax!

Don't miss out on this exciting and fun game. Join us and experience the most incredible card-drawing experience ever!

It's free, it's free, it's free!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains numerous scenes with exposed female breasts, sexually suggestive text, and suggestive sound effects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580, or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
